title: MacArthur Foundation Launches Grant Program To Reduce Jail Populations
teaser: NPR's Robert Siegel speaks with Sheriff Kevin Thom of Pennington County, S.D., about being one of the jurisdictions chosen by the MacArthur Foundation to receive a grant to work on reducing jail use.
